title: Guinea's Health Minister Says Ebola Situation 'Improving'
teaser: Guinea's health minister says schools will re-open on Monday after being closed because of the Ebola outbreak. Correspondent Ofeibea Quist-Arcton talks to NPR's Arun Rath from the capital, Conakry.
